text: Bɨ sip wog gɨlak ogɨnap sek agɨlak, Yɨgen awl dup ñɨn awl, man tɨmel anɨb awl ma yonɨgun, taun Piniks wulep mɨdeb ak am yonɨgun agɨlak. Yɨgen awl owup ñɨn ak agɨl, sip dam man anɨb ak lon, tɨmel ma gɨnɨgab agɨlak. Taun Piniks anɨb ak, man ñɨg tɨb kus gak Klit nab okok mɨdeb, sub saŋɨd amub kɨd okok ken nɨgak.
